Networked Systems H

Introduction

Networked System: Autonomous computing devices that exchange data to perform some application goal and how they communicate across a network

  • internet
  • digital broadcast
  • mobile voice telephony
  • sensor networks
  • controller area networks
»
dasha on Level3 and Semester2 10 Jan 2018

Algorithmics 1

Useful Textbooks
  • M.T. Goodrich & R. Tamassia, Algorithm Design: Foundations, Analysis, and Internet Examples, Wiley, 2002
  • D. Harel & Y. Feldman, Algorithmics: the Spirit of Computing, Addison Wesley, 2004 (also earlier 1992 edition by D. Harel)
  • M. Sipser, Introduction to the Theory of Computation, Course Technology, 2006
»
dasha on Level3 and Semester1 10 Jan 2018
